item.title: How to Add (anti dupe) In Delta Paying 5$ Please Ill Be ALot Better
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Open up client.java and search;

public void declineTrade() {

You should see this public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {

Replace it with this;

[code]public void declineTrade() {
if (disconnected) {
declineTrade(true);
}
declineTrade(true);
}
public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
other.sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
other.declineTrade(false);
}

	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.amount < 1)
			continue;
		if (item.stackable) {
			addItem(item.id, item.amount);
		} else {
			for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
				addItem(item.id, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	canOffer = true;
	tradeConfirmed = false;
	tradeConfirmed2 = false;
	offeredItems.clear();
	inTrade = false;
	trade_reqId = 0;
            other.closeInterface();
	other.inTrade = false;
}[/code]

Copy and pasted right out of my source.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add (anti dupe) In Delta Paying 5$ Please Ill Be ALot Better

Do you know how to make it so when you finish trading they have to wait 20 seconds before loging out?

Because loging out is part of the dupeing progress.
